page.title: 13Halesworth Transport
page.content: Halesworth Town Station was built in 1859.It has 2 platforms.One line goes to Ipswich,then London,the other line goes to Lowestoft.The waiting rooms and ticket offices are now closed.A bus goes to and from the station every 2 hours.The trains for Ipswich leave every 20-40 mins.Then the trains for Lowestoft leave every 20-30 mins.In Halesworth we have a welfare bus which is for the Halesworth Community.Mr. Fosdike runs a private coach service for schools,trips and he runs a shopping trip to Beccles every Friday The main roads in Halesworth are,The Throughfare,Bridge ST.,London RD., Norwich RD. and Quay ST.The town streets are very narrow and there are plans to build a relief road to take through traffic away from the Throughfare.
